summary: Allows the crafting of Azura\'s Stars and Black Star along with the ability to convert them to each other
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#DAA520][size=5][b]Craftable Azura's Star[/b][/size][/color][/center]
This simple mod enables you to craft an Azura's Star or Black Star and convert between them using what I hope to be vaguely lore friendly methods.

To craft or convert stars, you must first have completed the The Azura's Star questline and also have the Daedric Smithing perk.

Once these have been acheived you will need some materials to craft them.

[b][u]Azura's Star[/u][/b]
1x Daedric Heart
1x Ebony Ingot
2x Quicksilver Ingots
5x Grand Soul Gems

[b][u]The Black Star[/u][/b]
1x Daedric Heart
2x Ebony Ingots
1x Quicksilver Ingot
5x Black Soul Gems

To convert
[b][u]Azura's Star to Black Star[/u][/b]
1x Azura's Star
1x Daedra Heart
1x Ebony Ingot
3x Black Soul Gems (Filled)

[b][u]Black Star to Azura's Star[/u][/b]
1x Black Star
1x Daedra Heart
1x Quicksilver Ingot
3x Grand Souls Gems (Filled)

The Daedra heart and the 3 filled gems are required to overpower the current magic flow of the star to align it for White or Black souls.

The recipe should be availble at any smithing station once the requirements are met and will appear under the Misc section.
author: JazBlade
